eu_initiatives: Carbon capture, utilization and storage (CCUS technologies) and climate action
organisation_name: Spanish CO2 Technology Platform (Plataforma Tecnológica Española del CO2) (PTECO2)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit:
To foster the development and implementation of Carbon capture, utilization & storage technologies (CCUS) with the aim that Spain complies with its emissions reduction commitments and achieves a competitive industrial and economic CO2 sector. 
 
To promote an active and optimal collaboration between the scientific, technological and industrial communities in Spain and connect them worldwide. 
 
To support the Spanish Administration on the issues concerning this sector. 
 
To promote a balanced social perception and provide objective information to the public. 
 
To foster long term education, training and high level formation.
